title: ZombieSmash Android
description:
Test your survival skills while teaming up with unlikely allies in ZombieSmash !
ZombieSmash! is a Ã¢â‚¬Å“Survival ComedyÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ game, featuring undead-themed castle defense and entertaining, physics-based gameplay. The game casts players as Joey, a lone survivor pit against a herd of writhing, unrelenting zombies - to defeat the undead masses, players must use their fingers to flick and smash them until they're un-undead.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ To aid players in their fight, over 30 specials and upgrades allow for creative zombie demolition - including fun implements like asteroids, wrecking balls, liquid nitrogen and a gigantic, rolling boulder Ã¢â‚¬â€œ combine specials (for instance, smash nitrogen-frozen zombies with a boulder!) for added hilarity.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Sophisticated ragdoll physics produce unique and hysterical zombie deaths, and the proprietary SplatterEngineÃ¢â€žÂ¢ renders adorable cartoon blood and gore in a convincing and entertaining fashion.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Four game modes provide limitless replay value: 
o Campaign Mode challenges players to survive for over 31 intense days against the mounting zombie threat and another 30 nights in the NEW CAMP NOWHERE campaign.
o Endless Siege Mode confronts them with a never-ending zombie assault - hold out as long as possible, racking up an ever-rising body count.
o Sandbox Mode gives you all the tools to rain destruction down on those stinking, moaning zombies without any of the peril.
o Bonus Nights Mode : Smash and destroy zombies in new ways! Unlock this special mode through extended gameplay and using your braaains!
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Original soundtrack produced by famed game music composer Chris HÃƒÂ¼lsbeck, the talented musician behind the scores to classic games like Turrican, Giana Sisters and the Star Wars: Rogue Squadron series.
